View Javadoc
1   package org.hibernate.test.cache.ehcache;
2   
3   import java.lang.reflect.Field;
4   import java.util.Map;
5   
6   import org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.EhCacheRegionFactory;
7   import org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration;
8   import org.hibernate.cfg.Environment;
9   
10  /**
11   * @author Alex Snaps
12   */
13  public class EhCacheRegionFactoryImpl extends EhCacheTest {
14  
15  	@Override
16  	protected void configCache(final Configuration cfg) {
17  		cfg.setProperty( Environment.CACHE_REGION_FACTORY, EhCacheRegionFactory.class.getName() );
18  		cfg.setProperty( Environment.CACHE_PROVIDER_CONFIG, "ehcache.xml" );
19  	}
20  
21  	@Override
22  	protected Map getMapFromCacheEntry(final Object entry) {
23  		final Map map;
24  		if ( "org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.internal.strategy.AbstractReadWriteEhcacheAccessStrategy$Item".equals(
25  				entry.getClass()
26  						.getName()
27  		) ) {
28  			try {
29  				Field field = entry.getClass().getDeclaredField( "value" );
30  				field.setAccessible( true );
31  				map = (Map) field.get( entry );
32  			}
33  			catch ( NoSuchFieldException e ) {
34  				throw new RuntimeException( e );
35  			}
36  			catch ( IllegalAccessException e ) {
37  				throw new RuntimeException( e );
38  			}
39  		}
40  		else {
41  			map = (Map) entry;
42  		}
43  		return map;
44  	}
45  }
